EmailTemplate.description: Welcome email sent to a new BYOID customer. Supports only AnswerTech as of now.
EmailTemplate.name: New EMS User Is Provisioned BYOID Login
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to AnswerTech
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Target_User.FirstName},
This email is your notification that your registration is complete
Your Login Id: {!Target_User..External_Fed_Id__c}
There is one final step we need to complete to enable you to start accessing AnswerTech. You will receive an email upon completion within 1 to 3 business days.
If you have any questions or concerns, please call us toll free at 1-866-270-4706. Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you in the future.
Sincerely, AnswerTech
